entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 06:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
